name: NHOOK RIDER
description:
In a remote part of the universe there is a planet called Asabast, one day, a species of creatures began to destroy everything in their path, gradually extinguishing the Asabast.

This is how, after discovering that in the confines of space, Earth 3XX B.T,

there was a source of energy that could change the destiny of Planet Asabast, they created the NHOOK RIDER.

Nhook Rider, a bioandroid with a demihuman appearance, is sent to earth in search of orbs that can save his race and fulfill his mission.

He is half alien, half machine and totally epic.

Wake up and welcome to earth, Nhook Rider.
